description: Analyzes the sentiment of a specified text segment, providing a numerical score indicating the level of positivity or negativity and an overall classification of the sentiment as positive, negative, or neutral. Unlike other tools that provide more detailed analysis or specific language support, this tool offers fast and straightforward sentiment analysis for any given text.
